Our customers include industry leading brands such as, PVH, Birkenstock, Alexander Wang, Tommy John, SPARC Group, Michael Kors, Canada Goose, Patagonia, Calvin Klein, and VF Corporation, among others. Headquartered in NYC, coupled with international offices and research and development facilities, we effectively serve a global client base. 7thonline is proud to be recognized by Forrester and the CIO Magazine as a leader in retail planning technology.

•Merchandise Planning and Inventory Management with Integrated OTB

AutoStore
Booth # 493892
AutoStore™, founded in 1996, is a technology company that develops order-fulfillment solutions to help businesses achieve efficiency gains within the storage and retrieval of goods. AutoStore is global, with ~1,550 Systems in 57 countries. All sales are distributed, designed, installed, and serviced by a network of qualified system integrators referred to as "partners".

AutoStore was founded in Nedre Vats, on the west coast of Norway. The company has offices in Norway, the U.S., the UK, Germany, France, Spain, Italy, Austria, South Korea, Japan, Australia, and Singapore, as well as assembly facilities in Poland and Thailand.

Fulfillment & Replenishment Services
7thonline
Booth # 495047
Founded in 1999, 7thonline is a leading applications provider of cross-channel merchandise demand planning and inventory management solutions to global retailers and leading wholesale brands.7thonline’s data-driven SaaS solutions, powered by analytics and ML/AI have been transforming the way retailers understand consumer demand, react to emerging trends, and drive proactive decision-making to position the organization for rapid and sustainable growth.Our customers include industry leading brands such as, PVH, Birkenstock, Alexander Wang, Tommy John, SPARC Group, Michael Kors, Canada Goose, Patagonia, Calvin Klein, and VF Corporation, among others.Headquartered in NYC, coupled with international offices and research and development facilities, we effectively serve a global client base.7thonline is proud to be recognized by Forrester and the CIO Magazine as a leader in retail planning technology.Our modules include:
•Merchandise Planning and Inventory Management with Integrated OTB
•Assortment Planning, Item Level Planning, PO Requisition and Order Entry Management
•Merchandise Allocation, Replenishment and Fast Fashion Reorder Management
•Dashboard Reporting with Built-in Analytics and Business Intelligence
•Production Demand Planning
•Wholesale Account Planning

Afresh Technologies
Booth # 494292
Afresh is the world’s leading fresh technology company helping grocers make smarter decisions throughout their fresh supply chain, ultimately increasing profits and significantly reducing food waste.Today, retail associates at leading grocers like Albertsons Companies optimize fresh operations using AI-powered technology from Afresh.As a result, millions of customers fill their baskets with the high-quality fresh food they crave, no matter when or where they shop.Analyticalways
Booth # 492987
Artificial Intelligence for Retailers
End-to-end inventory management system leveraging Artificial Intelligence to increase your sales up to 25% and reduce overstock up to 40%.Our end-to-end inventory management system with Artificial Intelligence provides a more efficient omnichannel stock control, that reduces lost sales and prevents overstock of products that are not sold.We cover 360º of the retail management process: planning, store cluster, assortment, purchasing, commercial plan, replenishment and transfers, among many others.AutoStore
Booth # 493892
AutoStore™, founded in 1996, is a technology company that develops order-fulfillment solutions to help businesses achieve efficiency gains within the storage and retrieval of goods.The company offers both hardware and software capabilities and the AutoStore technology is interoperable with other third-party solutions.AutoStore is global, with ~1,550 Systems in 57 countries.All sales are distributed, designed, installed, and serviced by a network of qualified system integrators referred to as "partners".AutoStore was founded in Nedre Vats, on the west coast of Norway.The company has offices in Norway, the U.S., the UK, Germany, France, Spain, Italy, Austria, South Korea, Japan, Australia, and Singapore, as well as assembly facilities in Poland and Thailand.Avery Dennison
Booth # 495392
Avery Dennison Corporation (NYSE: AVY) is a global materials science and digital identification solutions company that provides branding and information labeling solutions, including pressure-sensitive materials, radio-frequency identification (RFID) inlays and tags, and a variety of converted products and solutions.The company designs and manufactures a wide range of labeling and functional materials that enhance branded packaging, carry or display information that connects the physical and the digital, and improve customers’ product performance.The company serves an array of industries worldwide, including home and personal care, apparel, e-commerce, logistics, food and grocery, pharmaceuticals and automotive.The company employs approximately 36,000 employees in more than 50 countries.Reported sales in 2022 were $9.0 billion.Learn more at www.averydennison.com.
Blue Yonder, Inc.
Booth # 494757
Blue Yonder is the world leader in digital supply chain transformation.Retailers, manufacturers and logistics service providers worldwide rely on Blue Yonder to optimize and accelerate their supply chain from planning through fulfillment, delivery, and returns.Blue Yonder’s AI-driven supply chain platform and multi-enterprise, multi-tier network enable more accurate forecasting and dynamic management of capacity, inventory and transport.Blue Yonder helps businesses navigate modern supply chain complexity and volatility with more resilient, sustainable supply chains to delight customers, scale profitably, and run flawlessly.","textTemplate":"","metadataSeparator":"

Booth # 494982
Board empowers leading retail and consumer brands to plan smarter with unified retail planning, delivering better outcomes, fast.By leveraging decision intelligence, Board helps enterprises gain critical insights, unifying strategy, finance, and operations for full control of performance.Trusted by top retailers like Burberry, H&M, Kering, Decathlon, and Swim USA, Board has been transforming retail planning processes globally since 1994, with 25 offices worldwide.bops
Booth # 504387
bops Collaborative Inventory Intelligence technology is helping many Retailers & CPGs such as Walmart, GS1, Colgate, Pepsi, Coty, and Duracell avoid lost sales, markdowns, and spoilage by streamlining their Next-Gen CPFR (Collaborative Planning, Forecasting, & Replenishment) process, providing inventory intelligence and a set of supply chain collaborative workflows to reduce out-of-stocks and overstocks.Bricz
Booth # 494732
Bringg
Booth # 493137
Bringg is the delivery management platform market leader, serving over 800 customers globally.Bringg’s SaaS platform simplifies the last mile experience, enabling organizations to turn delivery into a competitive advantage by leveraging innovative technology to manage fleets or tap into a global network of 200+ integrated carriers, including parcel, same day, and LTL.By providing a scalable, data-driven solution for dynamic fleet management, increased delivery options, and automated processes, Bringg creates a seamless experience for drivers, dispatchers, and customers while reducing last-mile costs.Learn more at https://www.bringg.com/ 
Buy With Prime and Multi-Channel Fulfillment
Booth # 501007
To help merchants build and scale their businesses across their own websites, other marketplace service providers, and social media channels, Amazon offers a suite of externalized ecommerce services that leverage the power of Amazon’s fulfillment network and the Prime shopping experience.Amazon MCF is the foundational supply chain service operating in more than 10 countries.This service gives merchants the option to have Amazon pick, pack, and ship their orders for channels beyond Amazon.com.Buy with Prime, currently available in the U.S., uses the trust and recognition of the Prime brand to help increase traffic and sales on merchant DTC websites, while also leveraging Amazon MCF to fulfill and deliver orders.For Prime members, Buy with Prime is a member benefit that unlocks even greater selection, value, and convenience beyond Amazon.com.By leveraging the power of Amazon’s fulfillment network and the trust and recognition of the Prime brand, retailers can quickly scale up and scale down a single, shared pool of inventory based on customer demand across their sales channels.CGI
Booth # 493997
We are a leading provider of end-to-end business and IT services with 90,000 professionals across 400 offices worldwide.We offer business and strategic IT consulting, systems integration, managed services, as well as our own solutions.CGI has a people-centered culture, operating where our clients live and work to build trusted relationships.As company owners, we partner with our clients to help them accelerate their ROI-led digital transformation, bringing the power of technology and innovation, and delivering excellence to every engagement.In the retail industry, our 9,000 professionals help our clients deliver on their brand promise, enhancing the customer experience and optimizing operations to drive revenue and margins.We recommend our CGI Retail Suite solution, AI-powered data-driven retail value proposition and full IT managed services to accelerate our clients’ ROI-led digital transformation.For more information, visit our website at: www.cgi.com/en/retail

Churchill Systems, Inc.
Booth # 496187
Churchill is a software and services organization that applies AI-based pattern recognition technologies to the understanding and forecasting of retail shopper buying behavior.Today, Churchill focuses on the real-world requirements of medium to large retailers.A major breakthrough occurred when Churchill engineers, utilizing AI neural network technology, discovered how to significantly improve the efficiency of AI-based retail forecasting applications, while at the same time, drastically reducing the amount of historical data required to build the forecasting and analytic models.Visit Us at Booth 1119 or Call to Schedule an Evaluation Today!Predict customer response to your regular price change options 
Select the optimum promotional offer price discount 
Maximize the outcome of clearance markdown price decisions 
Forecast promotional lift for each individual promo offer 
Calculate inventory allocation on demand (sales + lost sales) 
Update seasonal profiles more efficiently and more effectively
https://churchillsys.com/
Columbus Consulting
Booth # 495482
Columbus Consulting delivers solutions that drive true value and have been transforming the retail and CPG industries for over two decades.We are a retail consulting company of industry experts.Our approach is simple, if you do it, we do it.We are more than consultants; we are experienced practitioners who actually sat in our clients’ seats.We understand the challenges, know what questions to ask and deliver the right solutions.Columbus offers a unique, consumer-centric approach with an end-to-end perspective that bridges functional & organization silos from strategy to execution.Our specialties include: unified commerce, merchandising & category management, planning & inventory management, sourcing & supply chain, data & analytics, accounting, finance & operations, people & organization and information technology.Let us know how we can help you.To learn more, visit COLUMBUSCONSULTING.COM
Delivery Solutions
Booth # 494512
Leaders in Delivery Orchestration and Post-Purchase Experiences
Same-Day Delivery | Post Purchase | Curbside | In-Store Pick-up | Shipping | Returns | Fleet | Big & Bulky
Delivery Solutions provides an orchestrated delivery experience that enables success for many leading omnichannel retail clients across multiple categories.With its vast last-mile ecosystem and best-in-class solutions for same-day delivery, curbside, in-store pickup, shipping, lockers, autonomous, drones, and enhanced post-purchase notifications, Delivery Solutions optimizes last-mile delivery with innovative fulfillment models that future-proof omnichannel strategies, enhance brands, and delight customers.www.deliverysolutions.co
Focal Systems, Inc.
Booth # 501812
Focal Systems is the industry leader in retail automation solutions.By digitizing store shelves hourly and unleashing FocalOS, retailers unlock huge operational efficiencies, optimized merchandising, and streamlined supply chains which deliver impactful financial results.Focal is transforming retail by empowering store management to make automated, data-driven decisions.We are the operating system of retail.Georgia Pacific
Booth # 493332
The KOLO® System is a smart bathroom solution that helps ensure dispensers are stocked and fixtures are functional.The result: facilities can reduce waste and help improve customer experience and operational efficiency.Restaurant employees will have remote visibility to restroom traffic, dispenser inventory and restroom functionality allowing them to stay focused on more important tasks and only be alerted when service is needed.Impact Analytics
Booth # 494927
Impact Analytics offers a holistic suite of AI powered solutions to help brands future-proof their businesses using predictive analytics.The company has been pioneering and perfecting the use of AI in retail forecasting, planning, and operations for nearly a decade, serving the retail, grocery, manufacturing, and CPG industries.With tools for planning, forecasting, merchandising, and pricing, Impact Analytics enables retailers to make smart data-based decisions rather than relying on last year’s figures to forecast and plan this year’s business.The company also offers tools to automate functions the industry has long managed manually by spreadsheet and to unify and streamline reporting, so executives can rely on a single source of truth when making decisions.","textTemplate":"","metadataSeparator":"

Booth # 493857
Invent Analytics’ Omni-AI delivers significant financial improvement by empowering retailers to profit-optimize their supply chain.It orchestrates a retailer’s entire supply chain by unifying network planning, inventory and price optimization, and fulfillment in one framework.Invent Analytics puts your omni-customers at the heart of its tailor-fit solutions.It proves the financial benefits with pre-go-live simulations and rigorous A/B testing.Invent Analytics’ over 30 clients have experienced a 2-6% increase in profitability.Invent Analytics’ solutions are: Omni-Network Design Omni-Plan Suite Demand Forecasting
Inventory Planner by Sage
Booth # 501052
Inventory Planner by Sage is the premier inventory planning software and top-rated Shopify app, empowering thousands of e-commerce businesses worldwide.Inventory Planner offers accurate, hassle-free inventory planning.Our cutting-edge solution helps businesses streamline and upgrade their inventory operations and boost revenue with intelligent purchasing decisions driven by our advanced planning and forecasting capabilities.Alongside powerful integrations to Shopify, Amazon, and BigCommerce, merchants save countless hours toiling over data with Inventory Planner’s advanced reporting and product forecasting features.With smart replenishment strategies in place, our customers sidestep stockouts, trim excess inventory and low performing items, and optimize their inventory performance.Gain control, automate purchasing, forecast demand accurately, and make informed decisions swiftly with Inventory Planner by Sage.Kardex Group
Booth # 501742
As a global AutoStore partner, Kardex offers a modular and flexible automated storage and retrieval system (ASRS) to process orders quickly and efficiently.Optimally tailored to your structural conditions, no two AutoStore systems are the same.Each AutoStore is designed based on your operational needs and is fully validated through our simulation software.This ensures your warehouse automation solution will meet your demands and resolve your challenges.The compact cube storage technology AutoStore can be used across industries and is redefining warehouse operations worldwide.At Kardex, our focus on innovation is key to enhancing AutoStore performance and transforming the order fulfillment experience.By innovating and integrating cutting-edge tools like the Intuitive Picking Assistant (IPA) and Kardex FulfillX, we streamline warehouse operations, reduce picking errors, and boost operational efficiency.Intuitive Picking Assistant
• Guides operators through picking tasks by visually indicating pick location and displaying order information onto the port
• Recognizes hand movement to prevent picking errors
• Accelerates picking process, reduces picking errors, and creates an ergonomic environment

Kardex FulfillX Software
• Warehouse execution system that leverages advanced algorithms to optimize workflows, ensuring faster and more accurate order fulfillment
• Highly configurable software to optimize AutoStore robots, operators, inventory accuracy and flexibili
Kbrw
Booth # 504127
Kbrw's SaaS solutions help companies manage their critical business processes related to end-to-end order management, fulfillment, execution and omnichannel services.Our flagship solutions such as OMS (Order Management System) or WMS (Warehouse Management System) provides unique value to the market by unifying a full functional coverage, a strong adaptability, a true cloud-native experience, and a frictionless integration to any IT environnement.Kbrw has successfully served clients of all sizes in multiple industries, deploying solutions in more than 100 countries around the world.Koerber Supply Chain Software

Locus Robotics
Booth # 494047
Locus Robotics is the world’s leading enterprise-level, warehouse automation solution, incorporating powerful and intelligent, AI-driven autonomous mobile robots (AMRs) that operate collaboratively with human workers to dramatically improve product movement and productivity 2–3X.Supporting more than 150+ of the world’s top brands and deployed at 300+ sites around the world, Locus Robotics enables retailers, 3PLs and specialty warehouses to efficiently meet and exceed the increasingly complex and demanding requirements of today’s fulfillment environments.Named to the Inc. 5000 three years in a row, and winning more than 28 industry and technology awards, the Locus solution dramatically increases order fulfillment productivity, lowers operational costs, and improves workplace quality, safety, and ergonomics for workers.To learn more visit locusrobotics.com
Logicbroker
Booth # 493932
Logicbroker is a premier multi-vendor commerce platform that seamlessly connects trading partners regardless of integration types.Our modern solutions empower retailers and brands to Connect, Orchestrate, and Grow their commerce platform to take control of their customer experience by harnessing and analyzing vital first-party data, reducing inventory risk, and curating their expanded assortment.By improving the visibility into our client’s commerce programs, Logicbroker can better position retailers and brands for transformative growth.As business needs and demand shift, Logicbroker provides the ability to quickly switch suppliers and product fulfillment between 3P to 1P and responsibly find new sources of inventory that uphold your brand integrity and meet your delivery promise.We work with mid-market and Enterprise manufacturers and retailers across a number of verticals including Health & Wellness, Home Improvement, Consumer Electronics, Toys & Babies, and Consumer Packaged Goods and service brands such as Samsung, Victoria’s Secret, The Vitamin Shoppe, Walgreens, Ace Hardware, and BBQGuys.Makira LP
Booth # 493612
We lead omni channel retailers through retail modernization.At Makira, we excel in project management and data integration.From project design through implementation & support, Makira is here to ensure your Retail project success.Manhattan
Booth # 495972
Manhattan is a global technology leader focused on improving experiences and outcomes in supply chain commerce.Our cloud-native Manhattan Active® solutions and unmatched experience help increase top-line growth and bottom-line profitability for the world’s leading brands.The company designs, builds and delivers innovative solutions for stores, transportation networks and fulfillment centers, eliminating silos created by legacy solutions to unify operations and improve efficiency.Manhattan is at the forefront of leveraging behavioral and data sciences, including artificial intelligence and machine learning, to optimize every order.The company also helps customers build a more sustainable and profitable future by maximizing each shipment, reducing miles, and eliminating waste.For more information, visit www.manh.com
Metreecs
Booth # 503352
Metreecs helps retailers plan, buy, and allocate products using AI-demand forecasting.We prevent overstock and out-of-stock situations, allowing clients to eliminate waste, free up capital, and drive higher sales.Mi9 Retail
Booth # 494302
Mi9 Retail is a leading provider of software solutions that helps retailers effectively run and grow their businesses.Mi9 Retail is committed to innovation and customer service.MIRAKL
Booth # 494077
Mirakl is the global leader in platform business innovation.Mirakl's suite of solutions provides enterprises with a transformative way to drive significant growth and efficiency in their online business.Since 2012, Mirakl has been pioneering the platform economy, empowering retailers with the most advanced, secure and scalable technology to expand product assortment through marketplace and dropship, improve efficiency in supplier catalog management and payments, personalize shopping experiences, and boost profits through retail media.","textTemplate":"","metadataSeparator":"

{"id_":"f4ee39f2-d672-4e36-9084-bd4e0dcc96a0","metadata":{"url":"https://nrfbigshow.nrf.com/product-category/fulfillment---replenishment-services"},"excludedEmbedMetadataKeys":[],"excludedLlmMetadataKeys":[],"relationships":{"SOURCE":{"nodeId":"b8ef08cb-337c-4d8a-a71d-fc067b6556a1","metadata":{"url":"https://nrfbigshow.nrf.com/product-category/fulfillment---replenishment-services"},"hash":"s8QTOrnb+kTQyQ/1ZAE5hzhhROW8wAii9pq162C49ng="},"PREVIOUS":{"nodeId":"0b9d7c3d-c1df-4a53-8998-2a10b846cf9b","metadata":{"url":"https://nrfbigshow.nrf.com/product-category/fulfillment---replenishment-services"},"hash":"KpfB824lbmveSoaYou8j6DZG/FNqGvU+h1zVHDzbtY8="},"NEXT":{"nodeId":"2bf18bbe-4690-46ee-873e-4baa2e9591dc","metadata":{},"hash":"rvbmYEC3mOVkb7FkvGqaYGy83eLDisaPDvQXPjJ20BY="}},"text":"We prevent overstock and out-of-stock situations, allowing clients to eliminate waste, free up capital, and drive higher sales.Mi9 Retail
Booth # 494302
Mi9 Retail is a leading provider of software solutions that helps retailers effectively run and grow their businesses.Mi9 Retail is committed to innovation and customer service.MIRAKL
Booth # 494077
Mirakl is the global leader in platform business innovation.Mirakl's suite of solutions provides enterprises with a transformative way to drive significant growth and efficiency in their online business.Since 2012, Mirakl has been pioneering the platform economy, empowering retailers with the most advanced, secure and scalable technology to expand product assortment through marketplace and dropship, improve efficiency in supplier catalog management and payments, personalize shopping experiences, and boost profits through retail media.Mirakl is trusted by 400+ industry-leading businesses worldwide including ASOS, Bloomingdales, Express, Fanatics, Fossil Group, H&M, The Kroger Co., Macy’s, Madewell, NBCUniversal, Saks Fifth Avenue, SalonCentric (a subsidiary of L’Oreal USA), Shop Premium Outlets, The Bay, The Knot, and URBN.For more information: www.mirakl.com
Nextuple, Inc.
Booth # 495272
Nextuple software and consulting service capabilities solve your omnichannel Order Management System (OMS) challenges like outdated technology, painful upgrade paths, lack of customization flexibility, weak integration agility for creating new experiences, limited architectural choices, and the dreaded vendor "lock-in."With Nextuple, you can add AI/ML capabilities and agility to your distributed order management system quickly and at a reasonable cost by combining the best of "build" (your custom requirements) and "buy" (our pre-built modular microservices).Our Nextuple Order Management Studio is a modern Order Management Platform with composable microservices to transform e-commerce customer experiences and improve fulfillment efficiency.NXP USA, Inc.
Booth # 496092
NXP Semiconductors N.V.is the trusted partner for innovative solutions in the automotive, industrial & IoT, mobile, and communications infrastructure markets.NXP's "Brighter Together" approach combines leading-edge technology with pioneering people to develop system solutions that make the connected world better, safer, and more secure.The company has operations in more than 30 countries and posted revenue of $13.28 billion in 2023.Find out more at www.nxp.com.
OneRail
Booth # 500592
OneRail is a leading omnichannel fulfillment solution pairing best-in-class software with logistics as a service to provide dependability and speed to help companies meet their delivery promise.With an integrated network of 12 million drivers, OneRail matches the right vehicle to the right delivery so brands can rapidly scale their businesses.This people-plus-platform approach features a team of 24/7 USA-based logistics experts who get ahead of delivery exceptions to maintain a 99% on-time rate.OneRail shippers experience 35% faster fulfillment, 40-70% lower operational costs and 20% lower transportation costs.OneRail recently debuted at No.24 on the Deloitte Fast 500™ list of the fastest-growing tech companies in North America; made the FreightTech 100 for the third straight year; made Inc. magazine’s Best Workplaces 2023; ranked No.23 on Forbes’ list of America’s Best Startup Employers; and named to the Inc. 5000 two years running, most recently at No.59 with 7,409% growth.OneStock
Booth # 501922
OneStock’s Distributed Order Management solution helps companies streamline operations and improve customer satisfaction.Designed under a MACH architecture to integrate seamlessly with existing IT systems, our platform acts as the backbone of the order lifecycle, providing end-to-end visibility and control over orders, inventory and fulfilment processes.With our solution, brands effortlessly manage orders across multiple sales channels ensuring a consistent and frictionless customer experience.Some references: LVMH, s.Oliver, Intersport, Sergent Major, Truffaut, ManoMano, Pets at Home, Jacadi, Oxybul, RougeGorge Lingerie, Kaporal, Accessorize, Ted Baker, Radley and Phase Eight
More references: https://www.onestock-retail.com/en/oms-case-studies/
Position Imaging
Booth # 493117
Position Imaging enables logistic efficiencies with advanced tracking technologies that provide visibility throughout the logistics chain.As online shopping accelerates and eCommerce and fulfillment methodologies evolve, Position Imaging’s iPickup™ platform offers significant advantages to retailers looking to capture the loyalty of omnichannel consumers.","textTemplate":"","metadataSeparator":"
","type":"TEXT","hash":"cwmWrTuFF4Z6lZ2K5Z6veO84o7wyQLzp/sqgyI16hCo="}

2bf18bbe-4690-46ee-873e-4baa2e9591dc.__data__:
{"id_":"2bf18bbe-4690-46ee-873e-4baa2e9591dc","metadata":{"url":"https://nrfbigshow.nrf.com/product-category/fulfillment---replenishment-services"},"excludedEmbedMetadataKeys":[],"excludedLlmMetadataKeys":[],"relationships":{"SOURCE":{"nodeId":"b8ef08cb-337c-4d8a-a71d-fc067b6556a1","metadata":{"url":"https://nrfbigshow.nrf.com/product-category/fulfillment---replenishment-services"},"hash":"s8QTOrnb+kTQyQ/1ZAE5hzhhROW8wAii9pq162C49ng="},"PREVIOUS":{"nodeId":"f4ee39f2-d672-4e36-9084-bd4e0dcc96a0","metadata":{"url":"https://nrfbigshow.nrf.com/product-category/fulfillment---replenishment-services"},"hash":"6BhrFYxBeFPLPMgv+d5by/CoZSaY2cI5J+4b5n8m1ag="},"NEXT":{"nodeId":"e886bd36-92d6-47f0-8d33-e5b3936ba06b","metadata":{},"hash":"iytXAoRcuy4YDeURNfF3YincFrUmv+7ioXGwydxVNxk="}},"text":"With our solution, brands effortlessly manage orders across multiple sales channels ensuring a consistent and frictionless customer experience.Some references: LVMH, s.Oliver, Intersport, Sergent Major, Truffaut, ManoMano, Pets at Home, Jacadi, Oxybul, RougeGorge Lingerie, Kaporal, Accessorize, Ted Baker, Radley and Phase Eight
More references: https://www.onestock-retail.com/en/oms-case-studies/
Position Imaging
Booth # 493117
Position Imaging enables logistic efficiencies with advanced tracking technologies that provide visibility throughout the logistics chain.As online shopping accelerates and eCommerce and fulfillment methodologies evolve, Position Imaging’s iPickup™ platform offers significant advantages to retailers looking to capture the loyalty of omnichannel consumers.iPickup brings advancements in BOPIS and BORIS services that enable everyone in retail, from big box to boutique, to easily and affordably implement self-serve eCommerce fulfillment solutions that save time, money and labor, increase add-on sales and drive footfall.Predictoos
Booth # 501792
Predictoos is tackling one of retail’s biggest pain points: out-of-stock issues.Our AI-driven platform transforms inventory management by delivering precise demand forecasts and optimizing stock levels, so retailers can reduce costly stockouts and minimize waste.Seamlessly integrating with existing systems, Predictoos leverages historical data, market trends, and seasonal insights to balance inventory store-by-store, ensuring the right products are available at the right time.Retailers using Predictoos not only improve stock availability but also see up to a 4% increase in annual revenue, creating a smarter, more profitable approach to inventory.RELEX Solutions
Booth # 494557
✨Plan Better | Sell More | Waste Less✨

Unified Retail & Supply Chain Planning for
Forecasting - Replenishment - Space Planning - Pricing & Promotions

Check out our dedicated hub to learn more about our NRF activities and Big Ideas Session!Dedicated NRF Hub: https://engage.relexsolutions.com/relex-nrf-2025/Maximize customer satisfaction and minimize operative costs with RELEX's market-leading supply chain & retail planning platform.We help retailers, and consumer brands unify their planning, from demand and merchandise to supply chain and operations, for maximum customer satisfaction at the lowest operating cost.RELEX is a hyper-growth company with 500+ customers globally — ask any of them for a frank and independent assessment of our team and solutions.RELEX is trusted by leading brands including Lowe's, ADUSA, Door Dash, Sprouts, Dollar Tree/Family Dollar, Big Lots!, Sephora, AutoZone, Sheetz, Circle K, PetSmart, Whole Foods, Thrive Market, and UNFI, C&S Wholesales Grocers and has offices across North America, Europe, and the Asia Pacific region.Learn more at: RELEXSOLUTIONS.COM
ReturnGO
Booth # 501807
Rithum
Booth # 496322
Rithum (formerly CommerceHub and ChannelAdvisor) is one of the industry’s most influential and trusted commerce networks, helping brands, retailers, and suppliers work together to deliver third-party (3P) commerce experiences.The Rithum platform helps brands and retailers accelerate growth, optimize operations across channels, scale product offerings and enhance margins.Using its commerce, marketing, delivery and discovery solutions, Rithum customers create optimized consumer shopping journeys from beginning to end.More than 40,000 global brands trust Rithum to grow their business across hundreds of channels, representing over $50 billion in annual GMV.Rithum processes an average of 2.4 billion transactions every day for retailers like Best Buy, Adidas, The Home Depot, and more.RPE / Capstone Integrated Solutions
Booth # 495877
RPE and Capstone Integrated Solutions have joined forces to create a powerhouse in retail IT software services and solutions providing a broader and complementary offering.Both companies have a proven track record helping retailers increase sales, improve profits and enhance the customer experience.With over 25 years of experience, RPE offers strategic planning, process improvement, package selection, systems implementation and integration and cloud and managed services.Capstone, a full-service software and digital services company, brings premium engineering, cloud native and AI solutions to the partnership.Together, our team of industry experts is deeply skilled in selecting, designing, building and supporting software solutions across various platforms and verticals.We offer a complete breadth of services, from strategy, change management and software selection to implementation and support, helping clients succeed in an ever-evolving retail landscape.The companies are backed by Conanicut Capital and its IT Services Platform.","textTemplate":"","metadataSeparator":"
","type":"TEXT","hash":"uiVdV7SpwtbTwWgsDRVJdvOAvNsdvK/NvdS19gq2lxA="}

e886bd36-92d6-47f0-8d33-e5b3936ba06b.__data__:
{"id_":"e886bd36-92d6-47f0-8d33-e5b3936ba06b","metadata":{"url":"https://nrfbigshow.nrf.com/product-category/fulfillment---replenishment-services"},"excludedEmbedMetadataKeys":[],"excludedLlmMetadataKeys":[],"relationships":{"SOURCE":{"nodeId":"b8ef08cb-337c-4d8a-a71d-fc067b6556a1","metadata":{"url":"https://nrfbigshow.nrf.com/product-category/fulfillment---replenishment-services"},"hash":"s8QTOrnb+kTQyQ/1ZAE5hzhhROW8wAii9pq162C49ng="},"PREVIOUS":{"nodeId":"2bf18bbe-4690-46ee-873e-4baa2e9591dc","metadata":{"url":"https://nrfbigshow.nrf.com/product-category/fulfillment---replenishment-services"},"hash":"rvbmYEC3mOVkb7FkvGqaYGy83eLDisaPDvQXPjJ20BY="},"NEXT":{"nodeId":"163f7080-b7a6-4a39-b0c8-fcaaaad93eb4","metadata":{},"hash":"GTF4SPKZInx+mTUd5dwNhK9kgTLv0lYzSbIQ/p9mZcw="}},"text":"RPE / Capstone Integrated Solutions
Booth # 495877
RPE and Capstone Integrated Solutions have joined forces to create a powerhouse in retail IT software services and solutions providing a broader and complementary offering.Both companies have a proven track record helping retailers increase sales, improve profits and enhance the customer experience.With over 25 years of experience, RPE offers strategic planning, process improvement, package selection, systems implementation and integration and cloud and managed services.Capstone, a full-service software and digital services company, brings premium engineering, cloud native and AI solutions to the partnership.Together, our team of industry experts is deeply skilled in selecting, designing, building and supporting software solutions across various platforms and verticals.We offer a complete breadth of services, from strategy, change management and software selection to implementation and support, helping clients succeed in an ever-evolving retail landscape.The companies are backed by Conanicut Capital and its IT Services Platform.Learn more at www.rpesolutions.com and www.capstone-is.com.
S5 Stratos
Booth # 494027
S5 Stratos provides modern, disruptive, purpose-built AI powered Merchandising and Supply Chain solutions.S5 solutions are designed to address today’s business challenges of customer centricity and profitability, while preparing retailers for what’s next.ShipERP
Booth # 494562
ShipERP is a leading software company specializing in cloud-based and on-premise parcel shipping management solutions for ERP, WM, TM, and OM systems.With a commitment to simplifying complex shipping processes, ShipERP empowers businesses to achieve end-to-end automation, real-time tracking, and cost-effective shipping across global supply chains.ShipERP serves a diverse client base across industries, helping organizations enhance operational efficiency, improve visibility, and reduce shipping costs.Shipt, Inc.
Booth # 495622
Shipt is a personal shopping and delivery company that connects retailers with customers for their favorite products in grocery, home goods, wellness, apparel, and more.Shipt’s community of trusted Shipt Shoppers – more than 300,000 strong – sparks connections with customers by fulfilling orders with great attention to detail, excellent communication, and unparalleled service.Now available in over 5,000 cities and more than 80 percent of the country, Shipt and its marketplace drive incremental sales for its 130+ retail and brand partners.In addition to reaching customers through Shipt’s user-friendly marketplace app and website, many retailers leverage the company’s delivery-only, last mile service – Shipt Driven – to fulfill same-day delivery orders from their own websites.Shipt is based in the heart of the Magic City, Birmingham, AL with an office in San Francisco, CA.Teamwork Commerce
Booth # 494847
Teamwork Commerce is a flexible tech stack for retailers that includes POS, OMS, Clienteling, Inventory Control and Reporting - a cloud-based system that is constantly evolving to provide cutting-edge technology to meet the needs of the ever-changing retail landscape.With Teamwork’s omnichannel solution, retailers gain a deeper understanding of their customers to provide personalized experiences through invisible technology.Trusted by top retailers globally including, Moose Knuckles, Colorado Rockies, Asics, Milwaukee Bucks, Catbird and Paul Stuart.Learn more at www.teamworkcommerce.com.
Tecsys
Booth # 505272
Tecsys is a global provider of transformative supply chain solutions that equip growing organizations with industry-leading services and tools to achieve operational greatness.Tecsys’ solutions are designed to create clarity out of the complex supply chain challenges that organizations face with increases in scale, customer expectations and inventory.Built on an enterprise platform, Tecsys solutions include warehouse management, distribution and transportation management, supply management at point-of-use, retail order management, as well as complete financial management and analytics solutions.Through the co-creation of a more responsive supply chain, Tecsys ensures that growth-minded organizations have the chance to thrive and reach their aspirations.Over 1,000 customers trust their supply chains to Tecsys in the healthcare, retail, service parts, third-party logistics, and general wholesale high-volume distribution industries.Tecsys’ shares are listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange under the ticker symbol TCS.Theatro
Booth # 494857
Theatro is a leading innovator in voice-controlled mobile communication technology, dedicated to empowering frontline workers through seamless, hands-free connectivity.Leveraging Generative AI with Theatro’s Intelligent Virtual Assistant (TIVA) and Digital Workflows, Theatro equips employees with on-demand, context-specific knowledge that enhances customer interactions and elevates the service experience.Based in Dallas, Theatro serves many of the world’s most recognized brands, including The Container Store, Macy’s, Tractor Supply Co., Walgreens, Wawa, and World Market.","textTemplate":"","metadataSeparator":"
","type":"TEXT","hash":"P+CWELpZymAY0iqNh+VVIOVBmUL3Onc/EpA3aHFx5ow="}

163f7080-b7a6-4a39-b0c8-fcaaaad93eb4.__data__:
{"id_":"163f7080-b7a6-4a39-b0c8-fcaaaad93eb4","metadata":{"url":"https://nrfbigshow.nrf.com/product-category/fulfillment---replenishment-services"},"excludedEmbedMetadataKeys":[],"excludedLlmMetadataKeys":[],"relationships":{"SOURCE":{"nodeId":"b8ef08cb-337c-4d8a-a71d-fc067b6556a1","metadata":{"url":"https://nrfbigshow.nrf.com/product-category/fulfillment---replenishment-services"},"hash":"s8QTOrnb+kTQyQ/1ZAE5hzhhROW8wAii9pq162C49ng="},"PREVIOUS":{"nodeId":"e886bd36-92d6-47f0-8d33-e5b3936ba06b","metadata":{"url":"https://nrfbigshow.nrf.com/product-category/fulfillment---replenishment-services"},"hash":"iytXAoRcuy4YDeURNfF3YincFrUmv+7ioXGwydxVNxk="}},"text":"Over 1,000 customers trust their supply chains to Tecsys in the healthcare, retail, service parts, third-party logistics, and general wholesale high-volume distribution industries.Tecsys’ shares are listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange under the ticker symbol TCS.Theatro
Booth # 494857
Theatro is a leading innovator in voice-controlled mobile communication technology, dedicated to empowering frontline workers through seamless, hands-free connectivity.Leveraging Generative AI with Theatro’s Intelligent Virtual Assistant (TIVA) and Digital Workflows, Theatro equips employees with on-demand, context-specific knowledge that enhances customer interactions and elevates the service experience.Based in Dallas, Theatro serves many of the world’s most recognized brands, including The Container Store, Macy’s, Tractor Supply Co., Walgreens, Wawa, and World Market.Through its signature “Heads Up & Hands-Free” solution, Theatro unlocks the full potential of frontline teams, connecting them effortlessly to the people and information they need—all through the power of voice.For more information, visit http://www.theatro.com.
TRF Retail
Booth # 502582
TRF Retail is a predictive and prescriptive AI SaaS company that helps retailers improve their operations and make better decisions.Our AI models use financial potential benefits to provide retailers with real-time insights and recommendations.We offer a variety of services, including demand forecasting, price optimization, promotion planning, assortment optimization, supply chain optimization, customer segmentation, customer lifetime value analysis, fraud detection, and recommendation engine development.Our AI solutions have been shown to help retailers increase sales, improve profitability, and enhance customer satisfaction.We are used by a wide range of retailers, including grocery stores, department stores, apparel stores, and DIY retailers.If you are a retailer, we encourage you to learn more about our AI solutions.We can help you to improve your operations, increase your sales, and improve your profitability.WSI (Warehouse Specialists, LLC)
Booth # 502962
Warehouse Specialists, LLC (WSI) is a leading 3PL provider delivering reliable omnichannel fulfillment services nationwide.With the perfect mix of people, process, and technology, WSI empowers brands to make the most of their supply chain operations.We help brands optimize their logistics spend, streamline their operations, and improve customer satisfaction via a collaborative partnership.We understand that every business is unique.That's why we offer a wide range of customization options and value-added services to meet each partner’s specific needs.Whether looking for an exceptional unboxing experience for the end consumer, managing challenging seasonality, or trying a new multi-warehousing distribution strategy, we provide tailored solutions to elevate your fulfillment strategy.1101 New York Ave NW, Washington, DC 20005
1-800-673-4692 or +1-202-783-7971
Fax: 202-737-2849
